src:
Tinju Dunia: Video Detik-Detik Canelo Hajar KO Kovalev
03 Nov 2019, 15:19 by Terjemahan, Ariandono
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Saul Canelo Alvarez menjadi juara baru kelas berat ringan versi badan tinju dunia WBO, setelah merobohkan Sergey Kovalev lewat KO ronde 11.
Pertarungan Canelo vs Kovalev digelar di MGM Grand Arena, Las Vegas pada Sabtu 2 November 2019 atau Minggu siang WIB.
Canelo berhasil melepaskan hook kiri disusul hook kanan telak ke kepala Kovalev. Petinju veteran berusia 36 tahun itu tumbang tak berdaya di tali ring, yang membuat wasit langsung mengambil keputusan memenangkan Canelo dengan KO.
Kemenangan KO tersebut memberikan Canelo gelar juara tinju dunia ke-4, setelah sebelumnya dia menjadi juara di kelas menengah junior, menengah, dan menengah super. Rekor bertanding Canelo pun semakin moncer dengan 53-1-2 (36 KO), sementara Kovalev terpuruk dengan rekor bertanding 34-4-1 (29 KO).
Berikut adalah video detik-detik kemenangan KO Saul Canelo Alvarez atas Sergey Kovalev di ronde 11.
text:
World Boxing: Canelo Hajar KO Kovalev's Second Video
03 Nov 2019, 15:19 by translations, Ariandono
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Saul Canelo Alvarez became the new champion of the light boxing body version of the WBO world boxing body, after knocking out Sergey Kovalev through knockout round 11.
Canelo vs Kovalev battle will be held at the MGM Grand Arena, Las Vegas on Saturday 2 November 2019 or Sunday afternoon WIB.
Canelo succeeded in releasing the left hook followed by the right hook to Kovalev's head. The 36-year-old veteran boxer was defeated helplessly in the ring rope, which made the referee immediately take the decision to win Canelo by KO.
The knockout victory gave Canelo the 4th world boxing title, after previously he won the junior middle, middle and super middle classes. Canelo's record was even better with 53-1-2 (36 KOs), while Kovalev dropped to a record of 34-4-1 (29 KOs).
Here is a video of the seconds of KO Saul Canelo Alvarez's victory over Sergey Kovalev in round 11.
